ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates how to simple multi-series financial charts, with a Candlestick chart rendering OHLC data and three line series rendering Moving Average indicators
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to add [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#The%20Contours%20Series%20Type.html']Contours[/url] to a [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#The%20Heatmap%20Type.html']WPF Heatmap chart[/url]. Contours are provided by the [b]FastUniformContourRenderableSeries[/b]. This uses the same data-source the Heatmap: a 2D double[,] array.
[b]Documentation Links[/b]
- [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#The%20Contours%20Series%20Type.html']The Contour Series Type[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#The%20Heatmap%20Type.html']The Heatmap Series Type[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/Common%20RenderableSeries%20Properties.html']RenderableSeries API[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.Heatmap2DArrayDataSeries.UniformHeatmapDataSeries%603.html']UniformHeatmapDataSeries class[/url] - [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.Heatmap2DArrayDataSeries.NonUniformHeatmapDataSeries%601.html']NonUniformHeatmapDataSeries class[/url]
